sentences.en: A sore ankle a ripped fingernail and plenty of missed shots.

sentences.en: As I turned on my side I noticed pieces of fingernail, bits of skin and hair on the lift carpet.
sentences.cn: 当我转身侧卧时，注意到电梯的地毯上有零星的指甲、皮肤碎屑和头发。

sentences.en: Does fingernail surface appear be to owe those vitamins glossily?

sentences.en: Even those parents who seemed hard and demanding would just melt at the thought of their child in tears over a failed test or a broken fingernail.
sentences.cn: 即使看上去强硬而又苛求的家长，一想到他们的子女因考试不及格或弄破了手指而掉眼泪的时候，也会立即融化。

sentences.en: Fingernail why chairman blaze? How should treat?
sentences.cn: 手指甲为什么会长白斑? 该怎么治疗?

sentences.en: Guess how long is the longest fingernail in the world?
sentences.cn: 请大家猜猜看世界上最长的手指甲到底有多长 呢 .

sentences.en: He clipped off the few hairs of his spare beard with a fingernail clipper.
sentences.cn: 他用一把指甲剪剪去几根胡须.

sentences.en: He cut the fingernail to the quick.
sentences.cn: 他剪指甲剪了指甲下的肉.

sentences.en: He tapped Nim's memo with a fingernail.
sentences.cn: 他用指甲轻轻地弹了弹尼姆的备忘录.

sentences.en: Humans encounter a lot of trouble when they are the size of a fingernail.
sentences.cn: 当人类和手指甲一样大时，会遇到的麻烦可不少。

sentences.en: I have the fingernail clippers.

sentences.en: If finger is selected, remove fingernail polish with acetone or polish remover.
sentences.cn: 如选择手指, 用丙酮或除甲油除去指甲油.

sentences.en: Is fingernail what to vitamin lack in vain very?

sentences.en: It takes about 150 days to grow out a full length fingernail.
sentences.cn: 大约150天的时间就可以长一个完整的指甲出来。

sentences.en: Melanie gnawed a long, painted fingernail.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the relationship between the fingernail colour and the photoplethysmogram.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨爪甲色诊与甲床光电血管容积图的关系.

sentences.en: Six weeks after conception your baby is the size of your little fingernail.

sentences.en: The middle fingernail grows faster than all other nails.
sentences.cn: 而中指的指甲长得比别的手指的指甲快.

sentences.en: The seal on the frosted bottle of Zubrowka was broken with a click—of plectrum on fingernail.
sentences.cn: 齐白露加酒磨砂瓶上的封蜡咔哒一声被手指甲上的拔子启开。

sentences.en: The Sydney funnel web is able to drive its fangs through a fingernail - and isn't the least bit afraid of humans.
sentences.cn: 悉尼漏斗网蜘蛛可以把毒牙刺入人的指甲，关键是它们一点都不怕人。

sentences.en: The top of the box was sealed with wide brown parcel tape, Jacob managed to get his fingernail under the end and peeled off the tape in one go.
sentences.cn: 箱子的顶端是用褐色的包裹胶带封起来的，雅各布用指甲把胶带的一头抠起来，一下子把胶带整个扯开。

sentences.en: Through what fingernail does not have blood - vessel carry nutrient?
